name: Geopost
goal: Nous sommes une société internationale de transports de monocolis qui dessert l'Europe et le monde entier en express et differed
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Fraud prevention, Institutional affairs, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Toutes réglementations liées au: transport, marché intérieur, e-commerce, numérique, santé, concurrence, développement durable, recherche, logistique urbaine.
